title: GE2025: Ong Ye Kung introduces 2 SME bosses as new faces in Sembawang GRC
summary: Health Minister Ong Ye Kung introduces two new potential PAP candidates, Ng Shi Xuan and Gabriel Lam, both SME business leaders, for Sembawang GRC in the upcoming election.

title: GE2025: 'Always a challenge' to win back a GRC, says PAP Sengkang team's Lam Pin Min
summary: PAP Sengkang team led by Lam Pin Min with new faces Elmie Nekmat, Theodora Lai Xi Yi and Bernadette Giam conduct walkabout as they hope to win back the GRC from WP.

title: GE2025: PSP's Hazel Poa open to contesting single-seat ward to 'walk my talk'
summary: PSP's Hazel Poa says she's willing to contest in an SMC rather than staying in West Coast-Jurong West GRC, to prove she doesn't need to ride on others' coattails.

title: RDU Facebook Announcement
summary: RDU announces plans to contest in Jurong East, Tampines, Radin Mas, Jurong-Kranji, Jurong, and Nee Soon constituencies

title: PAR Facebook Announcement
summary: PAR announces plans to contest in Kebun Baru, Yio Chu Kang, Queenstown, Pasir Ris, Jurong-Kranji, Jurong Barat, Marine Parade, Bukit Sembawang, and MacPherson-Braddell constituencies

title: SPP Facebook Announcement
summary: SPP announces plans to contest in Pasir Ris and Bukit Sembawang constituencies

title: PPP Facebook Announcement
summary: PPP announces plans to contest in Jurong-Kranji, Ang Mo Kio, Nee Soon, Toa Payoh-Choa Chu Kang, and Tampines constituencies

title: NSP Facebook Announcement
summary: NSP announces plans to contest in Jurong Barat, Marine Yishun, Sengkang, Toa Payoh-Choa Chu Kang, Sembawang, Mountbatten-Hougang, and Tampines constituencies

title: PAP New Faces Redeployment
summary: Three PAP new faces - Chua Wei Shan, Valerie Lee, and David Hoe - redeployed as part of cabinet reshuffle and preparations for GE2025

title: Potential NSP Candidates for Tampines Spotted
summary: Five potential NSP candidates - Reno Fong, Mohamad Ridzwan, Lim Rui Xian, Nur Farahiyah Mahfoot, and Thamilselvan Karuppaya - spotted during walkabout in Tampines

title: PPP withdraws from Nee Soon GRC
summary: PPP withdraws from Nee Soon GRC to allow RDU to contest the constituency

title: SDP announces candidates for Sembawang West SMC and Bukit Panjang SMC
summary: SDP announces Chee Soon Juan to contest Sembawang West SMC and Paul Tambyah to run in Bukit Panjang SMC; party also plans to field a team in Sembawang GRC

title: PSP re-elects Leong Mun Wai as party chief
summary: Leong Mun Wai has been re-elected as PSP secretary-general, taking over from Hazel Poa who becomes vice-chair. A'bas Bin Kasmani appointed as second vice-chairman and S. Nallakaruppan as treasurer.

title: GE2025: Singapore Democratic Party to contest in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC
summary: SDP confirms it will contest in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC where PM Lawrence Wong is the anchor MP.

title: GE2025: WP's likely replacement for Raeesah Khan outlines plans for improvements in Sengkang
summary: Abdul Muhaimin Abdul Malik, likely to replace Raeesah Khan in WP's Sengkang team, outlines plans to address lift issues in Compassvale using his experience as a senior property manager at AHTC.

title: Ex-IMH director, Harvard graduate look set to be part of WP's slate in GE2025
summary: Workers' Party prepares to field its largest pool of first-time candidates with at least 17 new faces, including former IMH director Dr Ong Lue Ping and Harvard graduate Michael Thng.

title: GE2025: Singapore United Party to make election debut at upcoming contest in Ang Mo Kio
summary: SUP announces its debut contest in Ang Mo Kio GRC for GE2025, potentially facing PAP and PPP.

title: GE2025: PSP to contest West Coast-Jurong West and Chua Chu Kang, says it will field fewer candidates
summary: PSP launches its manifesto focusing on cost of living and jobs, confirms contest in West Coast-Jurong West and Chua Chu Kang GRCs, and announces plan to field fewer candidates.

title: Trade unionist Natasha Choy joins Desmond Lee's team in West Coast
summary: PAP newcomer Natasha Choy has joined National Development Minister Desmond Lee's team in West Coast GRC.

title: GE2025: Singapore Democratic Party unveils 5-member slate for Sembawang GRC
summary: Singapore Democratic Party (SDP) has introduced its slate for the five-member Sembawang GRC

title: GE2025: Why this 32-year-old is setting up a political party to contest East Coast GRC
summary: Restaurant owner Chia Yun Kai said that he decided to set up Most Valuable Party (MVP) to context in East Coast GRC

title: Red Dot United to contest Holland-Bukit Timah GRC, introduces three potential candidates
summary: Red Dot United (RDU) introduces Fazli Talip, Sharad Kumar, and Patrick Tan as potential candidates for Holland-Bukit Timah GRC.

title: Faishal Ibrahim to move from Nee Soon to Marine Parade-Braddell Heights GRC for GE2025
summary: Minister of State for Home Affairs and National Development Muhammad Faishal Ibrahim will join the PAP team in Marine Parade-Braddell Heights GRC to contest the upcoming general election.

title: GE2025: Maliki Osman set to be replaced by new face Hazlina Abdul Halim in East Coast GRC
summary: Second Minister for Education and Foreign Affairs Maliki Osman will not be part of the PAP slate for East Coast GRC

title: GE2025: PSP confirms it will contest Marymount, Kebun Baru, Pioneer SMCs again
summary: PSP confirms it will contest Marymount, Kebun Baru, and Pioneer SMCs again in GE2025 but has not yet announced its candidates.

title: Is'haq Rajoo Jay Facebook Live
summary: Is'haq Rajoo Jay announced on Facebook Live that he will contest Queenstown SMC as an independent candidate in GE2025.

title: PM Lawrence Wong to lead PAP team in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC for GE2025
summary: Prime Minister Lawrence Wong will once again lead the People's Action Party team in Marsiling-Yew Tee GRC in the coming election

title: GE2025: Criminal lawyer Marshall Lim to represent PAP in WP stronghold Hougang SMC
summary: Criminal lawyer Marshall Lim, 38, will be representing the People's Action Party (PAP) in Workers' Party-held (WP) Hougang SMC

summary: PAP formally announced its slate of four candidates who will be contesting in the Workers' Party-held Sengkang GRC

summary: PAP introduced its slate of candidates for Chua Chu Kang GRC

summary: Minister for Sustainability and the Environment Grace Fu will lead the PAP team contesting the new Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC

title: GE2025: PAP to field 4 newcomers in 5-member Aljunied GRC
summary: Minister for Sustainability and the Environment Grace Fu will lead the PAP team contesting the new Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC

title: GE2025: PAP to field Xie Yao Quan in new Jurong Central SMC
summary: Minister for Sustainability and the Environment Grace Fu will lead the PAP team contesting the new Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC

title: GE2025: Low Yen Ling to represent PAP in newly formed Bukit Gombak SMC
summary: PAP introduced current Chua Chu Kang GRC MP Low Yen Ling as its candidate for the newly formed Bukit Gombak SMC.

title: GE2025: National Development Minister Desmond Lee will anchor PAP team in West Coast-Jurong West GRC
summary: Minister for National Development Desmond Lee will anchor the PAP team in the newly formed West Coast-Jurong West GRC.

title: GE2025: Labour unionist Patrick Tay to defend his Pioneer seat for the PAP
summary: Labour unionist Patrick Tay will once again represent the PAP in the Pioneer single-seat ward

title: GE2025: PAP to field unchanged line-up in Holland-Bukit Timah; Liang Eng Hwa to defend Bukit Panjang
summary: The PAP team that will contest Holland-Bukit Timah GRC in the upcoming polls will remain unchanged

title: GE2025: SDA will focus resources on Pasir Ris-Changi GRC, to announce decision on Punggol GRC next week
summary: SDA will be focusing its resources on Pasir Ris-Changi GRC but stopped short of confirming whether it will be contesting Punggol GRC

title: GE2025: People's Alliance for Reform set to contest in Yio Chu Kang SMC
summary: PAR will contest the single seat of Yio Chu Kang in the upcoming general election, with lecturer Michael Fang, 48, set to represent the party.

title: Opposition Red Dot United goes on walkabout in Jalan Kayu, introduces party member
summary: RDU party went on its maiden walkabout in Jalan Kayu SMC and introduced a party member who will lead the team in the newly carved out ward.

title: GE2025: Piano teacher introduced as Red Dot United’s lead in Jurong Central SMC
summary: Red Dot United (RDU) on March 23 introduced a possible opposition candidate for the new Jurong Central SMC.

summary: Red Dot United (RDU) on April 5 introduced three potential candidates for the newly created Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC.

title: GE2025: Josephine Teo continues to helm PAP's Jalan Besar GRC slate
summary: Minister for Digital Development and Information Josephine Teo will continue to helm the PAP team in Jalan Besar GRC.

title: GE2025: Ex-army chief David Neo, academic Charlene Chen confirmed among PAP's Tampines GRC slate
summary: Former Chief of Army David Neo and assistant professor Charlene Chen will contest Tampines GRC

summary: Lawyer Alex Yeo will stand in Potong Pasir under the PAP banner at the upcoming polls

summary: RDU introduced three potential candidates for Nee Soon GRC in the upcoming election.

title: Red Dot United unveils line-up for Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC and Jurong Central SMC
summary: RDU unveiled its slate for the newly formed Jurong East-Bukit Batok GRC, which includes two candidates with political experience.

title: GE2025: PSP to field Hazel Poa's husband Tony Tan in Kebun Baru SMC
summary: PSP said it will field Mr Tony Tan in Kebun Baru SMC for the upcoming General Election.

title: GE2025: PSP to field former West Coast candidate Jeffrey Khoo in Marymount SMC
summary: PSP's Jeffrey Khoo will be its candidate standing in Marymount SMC at the upcoming General Election.

title: GE2025: WP introduces four fresh faces it will field in election, including former diplomat
summary: WP introduced four fresh faces who will be fielded in the upcoming general election

title: Darryl Lo Instagram Post
summary: Darryl Lo announces intent to be nominated as Independent candidate for Radin Mas SMC

title: GE2025: Opposition Singapore United Party unveils team to contest Ang Mo Kio GRC
summary: SUP unveiled the slate of candidates for Ang Mo Kio GRC that will face off against Senior Minister Lee Hsien Loong's team at the polls.

title: WP confirms Sengkang GRC team with new face Abdul Muhaimin Abdul Malik
summary: WP has confirmed its candidates for Sengkang GRC for the 2025 General Election.

summary: Transport Minister Chee Hong Tat will lead the PAP team in Bishan-Toa Payoh GRC that will also field two fresh faces at the coming polls.

title: GE2025: People's Alliance for Reform will field 14 candidates in 7 constituencies, introduces new face in Queenstown SMC
summary: PAR will field 14 candidates in seven constituencies in the upcoming General Election
